name: addcopyright
description: Concatinate a few files by command line

scripts.build: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run github
scripts.github: git add --all  && git commit -m "New version %npm_package_version%." && git tag %npm_package_version% && git push --tags origin HEAD:master && npm publish

author: Chupurnov Valeriy
